name: Scooter X
description:
Want to grind out to an epic 360, or bri flip into a bar whip like a pro on your phone? How about a buttercup or flair from the couch?
Well now you can with Scooter X, the ultimate in skate park scooter simulation goodness! With tricks, grinds, and plenty of ramps, you'll be in a new world of scooter fun!

With intuitive finger controls, take control of your deck and bars with a mere swipe. Enjoy pulling off awesome freestyle tricks and customizing your ride!

Practice for a game of scoot, or just scoot like a pro! Earn pro experience points and spend them upgrading your ride!

INSTALL AND RIDE TODAY!
